member.name: ASSEMBLY_FILE_DETAILED_INFORMATION
member.summary: TheASSEMBLY_FILE_DETAILED_INFORMATION structure is used by the function.

member.name: ASSEMBLY_FILE_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulFilenameLength
member.summary: Length in bytes of the file name pointed to by lpFileName. The count does not include the terminating null character.

member.name: ASSEMBLY_FILE_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulPathLength
member.summary: Length in bytes of the path string pointed to by lpFilePath The count does not include the terminating null character.

member.name: ASSEMBLY_FILE_DETAILED_INFORMATION.lpFileName
member.summary: Null-terminated string that specifies the name of the file.

member.name: ASSEMBLY_FILE_DETAILED_INFORMATION.lpFilePath
member.summary: Null-terminated string that specifies the path to the file named in lpFileName.
